reviews.review_msg: Great class with lots of group discussion. Recommend taking it with Michelle.

Cary is seriously the best professor that I have ever had! He truly cares about his students and wants everybody in his class to succeed. His classes are very interesting and you can tell that education is his passion. His assignments are also very flexible in terms of completion and format. I am taking his class again and so should you :)

Cary is one of the most caring profs I have experienced here at SFU. He is truly passionate about, and interested in the content that he is teaching. He values his students time that is put into the course work, so if you put the effort in, he will recognize that. His courses are not boring, and I would be happy to take another class with him.

I have had 3 classes with Cary and he is genuinely one of my favourite profs at SFU! He is so kind and caring! The course work is so unique compared to other education classes. I learned so much from him in every class that I have taken. I highly recommend his classes!!

Cary Campbell is a TRUE honor to have as a professor! Not only does he teach the course, he transmits his passion and knowledge to others in such a positive and uplifting way! He is clear with his assignments and is extremely transparent on what needs to be done. I would retake this course over and over again! SFU is beyond lucky to have Cary here!
Cary Campbell is a man that loves to hear himself talk. I don't feel like he taught me anything valuable.

Super kind and outgoing, he always tries to engage the class by asking so many questions. He is very good at explaining and will do so at any point if you ask him too. He has no problem repeating himself and is always listening to the class and what we want to focus on/is confused about. Super helpful as well when you need help on your project.

I sincerely think that she is an angel. She loves and inspires her students in depth. I never ever had this genuine professor in my life. My presentation in class changed my life and she supported me with lots of feedbacks. I hope SFU gives her many courses so many students can take her courses.
